## Starting a SparkR cluster on Amazon Elastic Cloud Compute (EC2) within RStudio

This demo is a step-by-step tutorial to get you started with **SparkR** on the cloud, particularly on Amazon Elastic Cloud Compute (EC2) <https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/>.

The instructions can be found on our blog <http://blog.sparkiq-labs.com/>.
